feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.7
entry.content:
• Removed Synology Improvements that caused various problems.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/8.1.6...8.1.7

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.8
entry.content:
• [Settings] Moved Apprise to new location settings called notifications
  • [Huntarr] Fixed settings sidebar to not show up in mobile mode when not being used
  • [Settings] Ensured that auto-saving properly works by ensuring the rest of Huntarr respect the changes immediatley

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.9
entry.content:
Fixes

  • [Huntarr] Added more code to ensure proper shutdown to prevent database corruption
  • [Settings] Removed unnecessary toast notifications
  • [Settings] Removed unnecessary header since we do not have the save button anymore and the nested form
  • [Settings] Fixed timezone saving issues and having them reflect and take effect in the system right away
  • [Scheduler] Changing time zones shows the proper server clock change
  • [2FA Settings] The copy button works under the user settings
  • [Apprise] Apprise notifications fixed
  • [Logs] Correct time shows up correctly and auto-adjusts to timezone changes
  • [Logs] Removed some console and log spam
  • [Stateful Management] - Times change if time zones change

Tracking Next:  - [Settings] Fix Plex Setup Login - [Whisparr] Add individual stateful management

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.10
entry.content:
Fixes

  • [Recovery Key] When utilized, it is fixed where it’s still valid. Prior, would clear and user would not know to create a new recovery key and be locked out if password were to fail again.
  • [Recovery Key] Added brute force prevention. If the user enters the recovery key incorrectly 3 times, they must wait 15 minutes to re-enter it again
  • [Whisparr v2/3] Now has individual state management
  • [State Management] Each multi-instance now has its own state management
  • [Swaparr] If Swaparr is disabled, then each of the Swaparr settings for each of the apps is disabled and hidden (instead of being disabled)
  • [Huntarr] All pages auto-refresh to ensure that the correct values are shown

Tracking Next

  • [Settings] Fix Plex Setup Login

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 8.1.11
entry.content: • [Plex] Fixed Plex LOGIN via the user page, the setup page, and login page
